abstract: The candidate promised to support the Defense of Marriage Act, and to appoint Supreme Court justices who would help overturn Roe v. Wade.
snippet: The candidate promised to support the Defense of Marriage Act, and to appoint Supreme Court justices who would help overturn Roe v. Wade.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, D.C. - Though Mitt Romney has stuck to a relentless focus on jobs and the economy while on the campaign trail, he departed from his usual message Saturday morning at the Values Voter Summit, devoting part of his speech to the socially conservative issues the crowd had come to hear about.

headline.main: Romney Tries to Reassure Socially Conservative  Audience
